title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5704.2 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5704.2 - General provisions

State Regulations

Tolls and special toll rates are payable in United States
currency at the toll booth and authority's bridge administration building, respectively, on the New York Plaza. All tolls stated are one-way. Canadian
currency is accepted subject to application of a premium or discount based on
variations from par with the United States dollar. An automobile includes
passenger automobiles and non-commercial vehicles such as light trucks not in
commercial service, motorcycles, recreational vehicles, ambulances, etc. Rates
include driver and all passengers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5704.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
